GSD.description:
hwmon: (w83791d) Fix NULL pointer dereference by removing unnecessary structure field

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.71 by commit 516d9055039017a20a698103be2b556b4c976bb8. For more details please see the references link.
